I'm a lot more aggressive when it comes to driving to the basket, so my teammates have to know what spot I want them to be in to be able to create shots for them. DALLAS, TX.-- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation.
